SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(rsvt_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(rsvt_no) + 1 END as rsvt_no FROM rsvt
INSERT INTO rsvt( rsvt_no, biz_no, user_id, rsvt_ymd, rsvt_tm, rsvt_nope, rsvt_want, rsvt_stts, alarm_yn ) VALUES( #{rsvtNo}, #{bizNo}, #{userId}, #{rsvtYmd}, #{rsvtTm}, #{rsvtNope}, #{rsvtWant}, #{rsvtStts}, #{alarmYn} )

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(rsvt_menu_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(rsvt_menu_no) + 1 END as rsvt_menu_no FROM rsvt_menu
INSERT into rsvt_menu( rsvt_menu_no, rsvt_no, menu_no, amount, user_id ) VALUES( #{rsvtMenuNo}, #{rsvtNo}, #{menuNo}, #{amount}, #{userId} )

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(pay_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(pay_no) + 1 END as pay_no FROM rsvt_payment
INSERT INTO rsvt_payment VALUES( #{payNo}, #{rsvtNo}, sysdate, (SELECT SUM (subquery."prc*menu") AS totalSum FROM ( SELECT( SELECT amount * menu_prc FROM biz_menu WHERE menu_no = rsvt_menu.menu_no ) AS "prc*menu" FROM rsvt_menu WHERE rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo} ) subquery), '카드결제')
